last_episode_to_air.name: Petals Fall, But the Flower Endures
last_episode_to_air.overview: The reason why Yu-ri was brought back to life comes to light. With the end of her 49 days imminent, all that remains is for her to make her choice.

name: Hi Bye, Mama!
overview: When the ghost of a woman gains a second chance at life for 49 days, she reappears in front of her remarried husband and young daughter.
tagline: Shh! It's a secret that I'm watching!

episodes.name: Life is Full of Unpredictable Surprises
episodes.overview: Cha Yu-ri, a ghost for five years, realizes her daughter can see her. Just as she decides it's time to move on, she is returned to her human form.

episodes.name: Forgotten Season
episodes.overview: Cho Gang-hwa is shaken by the sight of Yu-ri, who's got 49 days to find her rightful place. What's more, Cho Seo-woo has gone missing.

episodes.name: Realizing the Beauty of Life is Only Possible After Death
episodes.overview: Gang-hwa isn't sure how to reveal that he got remarried. Wanting to protect Seo-woo from lurking ghosts, Yu-ri eyes an opening at the preschool.

episodes.name: There is Nothing that Won't Happen to Me
episodes.overview: Gang-hwa worries when Oh Min-jeong notices that Yu-ri looks familiar. At her new job at the preschool, Yu-ri learns the child ghost's secret.

episodes.name: Every Moment When Chance Turns into Fate
episodes.overview: Yu-ri's human form causes a stir with the ghosts at the columbarium. Yu-ri slips up in front of Gang-hwa and Min-jeong at the preschool.

episodes.name: Even in the Face of Death, Family is Still My Number One
episodes.overview: Min-jeong wakes up with a mysterious face wound, and contemplates a big decision. Meanwhile, Gang-hwa faces disciplinary action at the hospital.

episodes.name: Where Flowers Bloom and Fall
episodes.overview: Yu-ri meets Min-jeong about an opportunity. While fulfilling a wish from Jang Pil-seung's family, Yu-ri finds herself in an awkward position.

episodes.name: People Who Can't Say Goodbye
episodes.overview: Yu-ri can't help but notice a ghost and his daughter's unfortunate circumstances, and crosses paths with someone who shouldn't see her.

episodes.name: Goodbye and Hello to Your Light
episodes.overview: Determined to kick out an unwanted ghost from Seo-woo's home, Yu-ri starts babysitting her. Gang-hwa makes an upsetting blunder.

episodes.name: Your Place Where I Cannot Reach
episodes.overview: With half her allotted days already gone, Yu-ri focuses on taking care of Seo-woo — and Min-jeong. Elsewhere, Gang-hwa and Jeon Eun-suk meet again.

episodes.name: The Share Of Life Given To Me
episodes.overview: The arrival of an unwelcome guest sets Ms. Mi-dong on edge. Yu-ri, Min-jeong and Go Hyeon-jeong have had enough of the preschool's bullying moms.

episodes.name: The Days I Was Forgotten
episodes.overview: Gang-hwa is shocked to hear Seo-woo say Yu-ri's name. Yu-ri grapples with the implications, as well as a threat from the exorcist.

episodes.name: A Story I Could Not See
episodes.overview: After learning that Yu-ri was by his side all along, Gang-hwa prepares to be honest with Min-jeong. The neighbors gossip about the trio.

episodes.name: It’s Not Your Fault
episodes.overview: Returning to the operating room isn't easy for Gang-hwa. After a day spent with Hyeon-jeong and her family, Yu-ri comes to a tearful realization.

episodes.name: My Life's Tomorrow
episodes.overview: If Yu-ri wants to stay and live, she must go back to her rightful place. As Gang-hwa resolves to make this happen, Min-jeong tells him she's leaving.

episodes.name: Petals Fall, But the Flower Endures
episodes.overview: The reason why Yu-ri was brought back to life comes to light. With the end of her 49 days imminent, all that remains is for her to make her choice.
